content:
Dear [Customer],

Thank you for your interest in our amazing product! We truly appreciate your willingness to pay $13 for it, and we want to ensure that we provide you with the best possible experience.

However, due to our invoicing policies, we are unable to create an invoice for less than $20. But don't worry! We have a solution that will benefit you in more ways than one.

We have another fantastic product that I believe would be a perfect match for you, priced at just $13. By adding this product to your purchase, not only will you satisfy our invoicing requirements, but you'll also get even more value for your money!

This additional product is not just any product. It's a [describe the product and its benefits using emotive language] that will [state how it will positively impact the customer's life or experience]. It's truly a game-changer!

We understand that this situation may be frustrating for you, but we want to make it right. By taking advantage of this offer, you'll not only get the products you want but also [emphasize any additional benefits such as free shipping or discounts].

So, are you ready to take advantage of this amazing opportunity? Let us know, and we'll get started right away!

Thank you for considering our products, and we look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
